item.title: 保险需求强劲，Progressive 季度利润增长
item.description: 财产保险公司 Progressive Corp 周三公布，受个人汽车保险需求强劲的推动，该公司第四季度利润增长了 19%。【原文：Property and casualty insurance company Progressive Corp reported a 19% rise in its fourth-quarter profit on Wednesday, driven by strong demand for personal auto insurance policies.】

item.title: -加拿大银行下调利率，称关税战可能造成巨大损失
item.description: 作者：Promit Mukherjee 和 David Ljunggren【原文：By Promit Mukherjee and David Ljunggren】

item.title: 加拿大银行下调 2025 年和 2026 年经济增长预期
item.description: 路透社渥太华1月29日电）加拿大央行周三下调了2025年和2026年的经济增长预期，理由是政府旨在抑制人口增长的政策产生了抑制作用。【原文：OTTAWA, Jan 29 (Reuters) - The Bank of Canada on Wednesday cut its growth forecasts for both 2025 and 2026, citing the dampening effect of government policies designed to curb population growth.】

item.title: DeepSeek 的聊天机器人准确率达到 17%，在 NewsGuard 审计中落后于西方竞争对手
item.description: 在 NewsGuard 的审计中，中国人工智能初创公司 DeepSeek 的聊天机器人在提供新闻和信息方面的准确率仅为 17%，在与 OpenAI 的 ChatGPT 和谷歌双子座等西方竞争对手的比较中，它在 11 个竞争对手中排名第十。【原文：Chinese AI startup DeepSeek's chatbot achieved only 17% accuracy in delivering news and information in a NewsGuard audit that ranked it tenth out of eleven in a comparison with its Western competitors including OpenAI's ChatGPT and Google Gemini.】

item.title: 美联储进入衡量货币市场流动性的艰难时期
item.description: 美联储将于本周三结束其最新的货币政策会议，即将进入一个更具挑战性的时期，即管理大多数观察家认为即将结束的资产负债表缩减。【原文：The Federal Reserve, which wraps up its latest monetary policy meeting on Wednesday, is about to enter one of the more challenging periods of managing what most observers believe is the approaching endgame for its balance sheet drawdown.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，D.E. Shaw 参股比特币矿商 Riot Platforms
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的消息人士称，投资公司 D.E. Shaw 已在 Riot Platforms 建仓，并可能推动其做出改变，这使其成为这家加密货币挖矿公司的第二位激进股东。【原文：Investment firm D.E. Shaw has built a position in Riot Platforms and may push it to make changes, two sources familiar with the matter said, making it the second activist shareholder to do so at the cryptocurrency mining company.】

item.title: 瑞安航空首席执行官奥利里对波音 737 增产充满信心，认为特朗普会给予支持
item.description: 瑞安航空公司首席执行官周三表示，该公司相信波音公司将在今年夏天把737 MAX喷气机的月产量提高到38架，并相信美国总统唐纳德-特朗普政府将允许该公司把月产量提高到42架。【原文：Ryanair is confident that Boeing will ramp up its production of 737 MAX jets to 38 per month this summer and that it will be allowed by the administration of U.S. President Donald Trump to then increase that to 42, its CEO said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Planet Labs 签订 2.3 亿美元协议，为亚洲客户建造卫星
item.description: 卫星图像公司 Planet Labs 周三表示，该公司签署了一项价值 2.3 亿美元的协议，将为亚太地区一家未具名客户建造卫星。【原文：Satellite imagery firm Planet Labs said on Wednesday it signed a $230 million agreement to build satellites for an unnamed customer in the Asia-Pacific region, clinching its biggest contract yet as the company expands beyond data services.】

item.title: Enverus称，2024年美国上游油气交易额将达1050亿美元
item.description: 咨询公司 Enverus 周三表示，2024 年美国上游石油和天然气行业的交易额达到了 1050 亿美元，是有史以来年度交易总额第三高的一年，但下半年交易活动有所放缓，因为买家发现可收购的目标减少了。【原文：Dealmaking in the U.S. upstream oil and gas industry hit $105 billion in 2024, the third highest annual total ever, but activity slowed in the second half as buyers found fewer targets to acquire, consultancy Enverus said on Wednesday.】

item.title: ASML 首席执行官认为 DeepSeek 对芯片需求有利
item.description: 计算机芯片设备制造商ASML公司首席执行官周三表示，高效人工智能模型的出现，如中国DeepSeek公司推出的人工智能模型，对芯片市场是一个净利好。【原文：Computer chip equipment maker ASML's CEO on Wednesday made the case that the advent of efficient AI models such as one China's DeepSeek has launched is a net positive for chip markets.】

item.title: 企业关注美国扩张以减轻潜在关税影响
item.description: 一些公司表示，在准备应对唐纳德-特朗普总统可能征收的关税时，它们正在考虑扩大在美国的业务或在美国开店。【原文：Some companies have said they are looking at expanding their presence or setting up shop in the United States as they prepare for President Donald Trump's potential tariffs.】

item.title: 受进口影响，美国 12 月商品贸易逆差大幅扩大
item.description: 美国 12 月份的货物贸易逆差急剧扩大，这很可能是由于企业因预期唐纳德-特朗普总统的新政府将征收广泛的关税而提前进口货物。【原文：The U.S. trade deficit in goods widened sharply in December, likely as businesses front-loaded imports in anticipation of broad tariffs from President Donald Trump's new administration.】

item.title: 特朗普传媒推出金融科技服务品牌
item.description: Truth Social 母公司 Trump Media and Technology Group 周三表示，其董事会已批准推出金融服务和金融科技品牌 Truth.Fi，该公司股价在盘前交易中上涨超过 15%。【原文：Truth Social parent Trump Media and Technology Group said on Wednesday its board of directors has approved the launch of a financial services and FinTech brand Truth.Fi, sending shares of the firm up over 15% in premarket trading.】

item.title: MSCI 第四季度利润因支出增加而下降
item.description: 摩根斯坦利资本国际公司（MSCI）周三报告称，第四季度利润下降了 24.3%，主要原因是成本上升以及与去年同期的艰难对比，该指数提供商去年同期获得了 1.43 亿美元的一次性收益。【原文：MSCI reported a 24.3% fall in fourth-quarter profit on Wednesday, hurt by higher costs and tougher comparisons to a year earlier, when the index provider had recorded a $143 million one-time gain.】

item.title: 特朗普竞选经理和前参议员加入 Coinbase 顾问委员会
item.description: 加密货币交易所 Coinbase 周三为其全球顾问委员会增添了四名高知名度成员，其中包括前美国参议员 Kyrsten Sinema 和唐纳德-特朗普总统连任竞选活动的联合竞选经理 Chris LaCivita。【原文：Crypto exchange Coinbase on Wednesday added four high-profile members to its global advisory council, including former U.S. Senator Kyrsten Sinema and Chris LaCivita, co-campaign manager for President Donald Trump's re-election.】

item.title: 利安德巴塞尔在欧洲签署可再生能源电力购买协议
item.description: 石化产品制造商利安德巴塞尔公司（LyondellBasell）周三表示，该公司已在欧洲签署了风能购电协议，以支持其减少温室气体排放的承诺。【原文：Petrochemicals manufacturer LyondellBasell said on Wednesday it has signed power purchase agreements in Europe for wind energy to support its commitment to reducing greenhouse gas emissions.】

item.title: Vans 母公司 VF Corp 季度业绩超出预期，扭亏为盈计划初见成效
item.description: 服装和鞋类生产商 VF 公司周三公布的第三季度营收和利润均超出预期，这主要得益于该公司努力恢复需求，并更新了旗下 Vans、North Face 和 Timberland 品牌的产品阵容。【原文：Apparel and footwear maker VF Corp beat third-quarter revenue and profit estimates on Wednesday, helped by efforts to revive demand and refresh the product lineup of its Vans, North Face and Timberland brands.】

item.title: 人工智能相关基础设施需求强劲，康宁第一季度业绩预计高于预期
item.description: 康宁公司周三预计第一季度营收和利润将超过华尔街预期，这家大猩猩玻璃制造商预计其用于人工智能相关基础设施的光纤产品需求强劲。【原文：Corning on Wednesday forecasted first-quarter revenue and profit that beat Wall Street expectations, with the Gorilla Glass-maker expecting robust demand for its optical fiber products for artificial intelligence-related infrastructure.】

item.title: 对冲基金流动 高盛数据显示，股票对冲基金在 DeepSeek 崩溃中单日大跌
item.description: 根据高盛周二发布的最新交易信息和行业数据，对冲基金选股人周一在中国低成本人工智能模式出现引发的全球科技股大跌中损失了数十亿美元。【原文：Hedge fund stock-pickers lost billions of dollars on Monday in a rout in global technology shares sparked by the emergence of a low-cost Chinese artificial intelligence model, according to a Goldman Sachs trading update and industry figures on Tuesday.】

item.title: 精神航空拒绝边疆航空的出价，预计将在第一季度退出破产程序
item.description: 精神航空公司（Spirit Airlines）周三表示，预计将在第一季度退出破产程序，并拒绝了与竞争对手边疆集团（Frontier Group）的合并，称这对这家低成本航空公司不利。【原文：Spirit Airlines on Wednesday said it expects to exit bankruptcy in the first quarter and rejected a merger with rival Frontier Group , saying it was not favorable for the low-cost carrier.】

item.title: 欧盟为未来竞争指明方向，追赶中美竞争对手
item.description: 欧盟委员会周三提出了扭转欧盟工业衰退的计划，并加大力度在人工智能等新领域与美国和中国竞争，同时降低能源成本，减少繁文缛节。【原文：The European Commission presented on Wednesday its plans to reverse industrial decline in the bloc and step up efforts to compete with the United States and China in new fields such as AI, and to lower energy costs and cut red tape.】

item.title: 中国 DeepSeek 背后的人工智能量化基金 High-Flyer
item.description: 量化对冲基金 "高飞"（High-Flyer）利用人工智能模型做出投资决策，建立了一个 1000 亿元人民币（约合 137.9 亿美元）的投资组合，但在 2023 年决定改变轨道，专注于开发最前沿的人工智能。【原文：Quantitative hedge fund, High-Flyer, built a 100 billion yuan ($13.79 billion) portfolio using artificial intelligence models to make investment decisions, but in 2023 decided to change track to focus on developing the most cutting-edge AI.】

item.title: 通用动力公司利润超预期，国防需求稳定
item.description: 通用动力公司（General Dynamics）周三公布的第四季度利润超出华尔街预期，原因是对军用弹药和车辆的持续需求推动了其国防业务的发展。【原文：General Dynamics beat Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter profit on Wednesday, as sustained demand for military munitions and vehicles boosted its defense businesses.】

item.title: T-Mobile 预计 2025 年用户数量将在强劲的假期季度后实现强劲增长
item.description: T-Mobile 周三预测，受其价格合理的高端 5G 计划需求增长的推动，其年度用户增长将强于预期，这使其股价在盘前交易中上涨了 7%。【原文：T-Mobile forecast stronger-than-expected annual subscriber growth driven by increased demand for its affordable premium 5G plans on Wednesday, boosting its shares 7% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 纳斯达克第四季度利润因金融科技股走强而增长
item.description: 纳斯达克（Nasdaq）周三公布第四季度利润增长，主要得益于市场对该交易所金融技术产品的强劲需求。【原文：Nasdaq reported a higher fourth-quarter profit on Wednesday, helped by strong demand for the exchange operator's financial technology products.】

item.title: 人工智能驱动的车辆检测初创公司 UVeye 获 1.91 亿美元股权和债务融资
item.description: UVeye 是一家利用人工智能技术检测车辆以避免缺陷和有针对性地进行维修的初创公司，该公司周三表示，已通过债务和股权融资筹集了 1.91 亿美元，用于扩大在北美和欧洲的生产规模。【原文：UVeye, a startup that uses AI-driven technology to inspect vehicles to avoid defects and target repairs, said on Wednesday it has raised $191 million in debt and equity to scale up production in North America and Europe.】

item.title: 阿克苏诺贝尔将裁员目标提高至2200人，预计2025年将关闭更多工厂
item.description: 多乐士（Dulux）涂料生产商阿克苏诺贝尔（Akzo Nobel）周三表示，作为重组工作的一部分，该公司预计将裁员约2200人，并在2025年至少再关闭五个生产基地。【原文：Akzo Nobel expects to cut around 2,200 jobs and to close at least five more sites in 2025 as part of its restructuring efforts, the Dulux paints maker said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Haleon 将向美国研发中心投资 5,400 万美元，以促进产品创新
item.description: 消费保健品公司 Haleon 周三表示，将向其位于美国里士满的全球研发中心投资 5400 万美元，以促进新产品创新。【原文：Consumer healthcare company Haleon said on Wednesday it will invest $54 million in its global research and development centre in Richmond, U.S., aiming to boost its pipeline for new product innovations.】

item.title: 华尔街为炼油企业第四季度盈利下降和关税计划做好准备
item.description: 由于燃料需求疲软，华尔街正在为美国炼油企业第四季度利润大幅下滑做准备，同时也在寻求该行业为应对唐纳德-特朗普总统威胁对从加拿大和墨西哥进口的原油征收关税所做准备的清晰度。【原文：Wall Street is bracing for a sharp decline in U.S. oil refiners' fourth-quarter profits as fuel demand softened, while seeking clarity on the sector's preparations for President Donald Trump's threatened tariffs on crude imports from Canada and Mexico.】

item.title: 淡水河谷首席执行官会见巴西总统卢拉，吹嘘与政府议程 "趋同
item.description: 巴西矿业公司淡水河谷首席执行官周二与巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦举行了首次正式会晤，他在会晤中强调，淡水河谷的项目与巴西的发展议程 "高度一致"。【原文：Brazilian miner Vale's CEO held his first official meeting with President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva on Tuesday, the company said, where he highlighted that there was "enormous convergence" between its projects and the country's development agenda.】
